subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Replay officials could not definitively say Daniel Brière’s shot with 17 seconds left in the third period had crossed the line, preserving the Rangers’ victory. The series is now tied, 2-2.
snippet: Replay officials could not definitively say Daniel Brière’s shot with 17 seconds left in the third period had crossed the line, preserving the Rangers’ victory. The series is now tied, 2-2.
